net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.input.gamepad

Class Gamepad

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.input.gamepad.Gamepad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Gamepad
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A class which encapsulates a Controller of type Controller.Type#GAMEPAD, and polls all appropriate Components on its own thread.
    Since:
    Apr 29, 2015, 9:11:58 PM
    Author:
    Christian Bryce Alexander

      • getLeftTrigger

        public float getLeftTrigger()
        NOTE: With the Controller class, the triggers are considered as one axis, and therefore, cannot register magnitudes separately.
        Returns:
        The magnitude of the left trigger as a value between 0f and 1f

      • getLeftTriggerDelta

        public float getLeftTriggerDelta()
        NOTE: With the Controller class, the triggers are considered as one axis, and therefore, cannot register magnitudes separately.
        Returns:
        The change in the magnitude of the left trigger as a value between 0f and 1f

        NOTE: With the Controller class, the triggers are considered as one axis, and therefore, cannot register magnitudes separately.
